document.title: Take 10 for Trace

subject-areas.subject-area: Trace: Tennessee Research and Creative Exchange

document.abstract: These slides accompanied a ten-minute presentation introducing faculty to the capabilities of the campus digital showcase and archive, including mention of the library's digital peer-reviewed Newfound Press.

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Linda Phillips and Margaret Casado. "Take 10 for Trace." Presentation to the Modern Foreign Languages & Literatures Department, University of Tennessee, Knoxville, TN, May 4, 2010. Available at: http://works.bepress.com/linda_phillips/9

field.name: source_publication
field.value: Modern Foreign Languages & Literatures Department, University of Tennessee
